original_text: But he became very proud and he boasted about his power. So God took away his kingdom. People did not respect him any longer as king.
korean_text: 그가 마음이 높아지며 뜻이 완악하여 교만을 행하므로 그의 왕위가 폐한 바 되며 그의 영광을 빼앗기고

sentences.original_text: and he boasted about his power
So God took away his kingdom
People did not respect him any longer
sentences.korean_translation: 사람들은 더 이상 그를 존경하지 않았습니다
